TopicTitle: Music - The Spacey Music Project [Orchestral Music for KSP]

Articles.Content:
Hey there Kerbonauts!

On my free time i occasionally compose some music, mainly orchestral scores. Lately i have been working on some music more connected to the Kerbal universe, trying a lot of sounds and hope to be able to release a small kit of songs that is spacey and Kerbal like.

The progress lately have been a bit slow, scraped a lot of songs i was not satisfied with or put to side, if it did not match the theme.

Now though i have around 4 songs in early states that is fitting and i plan to continue working on.

All my work finished work will end up on my Soundcloud, then linked here.

I'll try to include a youtube link for you 'tubers' out there as well!

First off, here is my profile on Soundcloud and Youtube.

My Soundcloud profile

My Youtube profile

I will update the thread as the project progresses

Songs:

Kerbal Space Program Main Theme - Orchestral Tribute

My first song for this kit has been out around a little while and was a short weekend project i made.

The song is the tribute to the main theme written by Harvester.

Soundcloud: Kerbal Space Program Main Theme - Orchestral Tribute

Youtube:

The Kerbal Blues - A swingly take on the Kerbal Space Program Theme

Can the Kerbal Space Program theme swing? It sure seems that way.

A simple Blues 12 where all the solos are based of the famous game theme.

Soundcloud: The Kerbal Blues - A swingly take on the Kerbal Space Program Theme

Kerbal Space Program Main Theme - NES 8-Bit version

This is my third and final variation on the Kerbal Space Program Main Theme.

I Grew up with the 8-bit era of gaming, and have a still to this day love my Nintendo Entertainment System! I wanted to make a proper NES version of the Ksp theme, as it could have sounded if it where released back in the 80's.

To make it Authentic im using a proper Emulation of the NES sound chip, and restricted myself to the limitations of the NES.

Soundcloud: Kerbal Space Program Main Theme - NES 8-Bit versionTheme

Edited April 28, 2014 by igel_son
Thank you! Well, i normally use Sonar, with some extra VST instruments
May I use your music in a movie? I don't know what movie that I want to make with this, but it will be cool
Hey! Sure, feel free to use it! You can download and use all my music from my Soundcloud, as long as im credited and a link to my page in the description of the movie
Updated the thread with the latest part of the project, a simple blues song, hope you enjoy it!
Updated. Added a third song to the thread. NES 8-bit version of the main theme. Enjoy
